creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
inscription: Lid verso: ウンスン歌留多硯筥 {Unsun karuta suzuribako}; lid recto: 靫彦蔵 {Yukihiko zo}, red seal: 新; Label: うんすんかるた蒔絵硯箱　江戸時代　Writing box.  Edo period (1615-1867).  Wood, lacquered, with maki-e (gold lacquer).  Design of un-sun karuta (playing cards).; wrapping paper: ウンスンか (歌)留多  硯箱; another lid verso: ウンスン骨牌硯筥; On the black suzuri: 天下一　杉本　豊後
markings: paper card inside storage box: [Japanese] / Writing box. / Edo Period (1615-1867). / Wood, lacquered, with maki-e / (gold lacquer). Design of / un-sun karuta (playing / cards).
signed: inkstone signed on base: 天下一　杉本　豊後 Tenkaichi Sugimoto Toyo [illeg]
title: Writing box with playing cards (unsun karuta) design
